instigate.simCardChangeNotifier.services

Class SimCardCheckService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • instigate.simCardChangeNotifier.services.SimCardCheckService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks

    public class SimCardCheckService
extends android.app.Service
    Changed by Vram and Anahit S. on 10/24/13.

    Starts background service, checks if the active Sim Card Serial Number is registered in the Application's registered numbers Database. If the number is not found in the Database, Application sends SMSes with active phone number and GPS coordinates (in case of possibility) to trusted person.
